entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
